name: Paul William PILGER, petitioner, v. BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
name_abbreviation: Pilger v. Bank of Am., N.A.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Paul William PILGER, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until November 4, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
Paul William PILGER, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
No. 14-5574.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 14, 2014.
Opinion
